alert.note: Alert for Scioto (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 5:55PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...SHOWERS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF EASTERN SCIOTO COUNTY THROUGH 630 PM EDT... At 555 PM EDT, showers were located along a line extending from near Lucasville to South Shore, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Portsmouth, Wheelersburg, New Boston, South Webster, Rosemount, Clarktown, Sciotodale, Franklin Furnace, Lucasville, Minford, Haverhill, Powellsville, Portsmouth Regional Airport, Lyra and West Portsmouth. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
